頕字的基本解释

頕
dān
颊缓。

頕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dān］
［《廣韻》都甘切，平談，端。］
颊缓。
[②]［diàn］
［《集韻》都念切，去，端。］
低下头。

頕字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頕； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1402第01
【廣韻】都甘切，音擔。【玉篇】頰緩也。　又【集韻】都念切，音店。垂首也。

頕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
頕字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yong
dān
Cheeks are slow.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dān］
["Guang Yun" are all willing to cut, flat talk, end. ]
Cheeks are slow.
[②]［diàn］
["Ji Yun" all read and cut, go to , end. ]
Lower your head.
Yong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　頕; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1402 No. 01
[Guangyun] All cuts are sweet, and the sound is loaded. [Jade articles] The cheeks are also slow.　[Jiyun] All read cut, Yindian. Bow down too.
